attributes.action: Legislation passed through Parliament to affect MP's with no opt out or loopholes for them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mp's have set rules and created legislation to which they do not have to adhere. the practice of governing and legislating for the general electorate in this country, but providing an opt out for mp's has to stop. to govern fairly and equitably, any decisions passed through parliament should affect mp's to the same extent that it affects the general public. anything short of this is manipulation of the system for personal and financial gain.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
